sentences.en: An adverse economic forecast will stimulate action intended to falsify it.
sentences.cn: 不利的经济预报将会刺激人们作出使预报失灵的行动.

sentences.en: An unbalanced diet has an adverse effect upon health.
sentences.cn: 饮食摄取不均衡会对健康产生不良的影响.

sentences.en: Despite the adverse conditions, the road was finished in just eight months.
sentences.cn: 尽管存在种种不利情况，公路还是仅用8个月就完工了。

sentences.en: Dirt and disease are adverse to the best growth of children.
sentences.cn: 肮脏与疾病对儿童健康成长不利.

sentences.en: He is adverse to going abroad.
Inflation is considered to be undesirable because of its adverse effects on income distribution.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀被认为是有害的，因为它会对收入分配产生不利影响。

sentences.en: Miller’s campaign has received a good deal of adverse publicity .
sentences.cn: 米勒的竞选活动招来许多负面报道。

sentences.en: My sister's taste in dresses is adverse to my own.

sentences.en: Observant husbandmen usually hate some of the adverse reaction.

sentences.en: Protein malnutrition may result in a number of other adverse effect.

sentences.en: The character of the pine and cypress is shown in frigid winter ; the sincerity of one's friend is shown in adverse circumstances.
sentences.cn: 岁寒知松柏,患难见交情.

sentences.en: The expedition encountered adverse weather conditions.

sentences.en: The improper use of medicine could lead to severe adverse reactions.
sentences.cn: 用药不当会产生严重的不良反应。

sentences.en: The judge gave us an adverse decision.
sentences.cn: 法官作出对我们不利的判决。

sentences.en: The plane's onward movement was slowed by adverse winds.
sentences.cn: 飞机前进的速度因逆风而减慢.

sentences.en: The police said Mr Hadfield's decision would have no adverse effect on the progress of the investigation.
sentences.cn: 警方称哈德菲尔德先生的决定将不会对调查的进展造成不利影响。

sentences.en: They fear it could have an adverse effect on global financial markets.
sentences.cn: 他们担心这会对全球金融市场产生不利影响。
